cause.description:
Women and girls who play ice hockey will grow their self confidence and esteem. It's a chance to take on leadership roles, learn the value of team work, sacrifice, support, personal responsibility and accountability. It is an expensive sport; one whose costs render some women unable to participate at all.
1. Women need to get on the ice
2. Hockey is a self-esteem and confidence building activity
3. Women and girls who play will be stronger people in their personal and professional lives
cause.mission: Help women afford to play ice hockey
cause.name: Women's Hockey
